rules.description: Fails when typography uses more font sizes than the constitution allows.
rules.remediation: Reduce font size variants to the maximum allowed and reuse existing roles.

rules.description: Fails when typography roles violate the declared hierarchy ranges.
rules.remediation: Align role sizes to the allowed min/max per hierarchy level.

rules.description: Fails when spacing values are not enumerated by the constitution.
Fails when spacing variance exceeds the allowed range.
rules.remediation: Normalize spacing values to keep variance within the allowed limit.

rules.description: Fails when undeclared or unauthorized colors are used.
rules.remediation: Map all colors to allowed tokens from the constitution.

rules.description: Fails when contrast ratios fall below the constitution floor.
rules.remediation: Increase contrast or adjust palette to meet the minimum ratio.

rules.description: Fails when interaction density exceeds intent limits.
rules.remediation: Reduce interactions per view to align with design intent density limits.

rules.description: Fails when radius, elevation, or motion values are outside allowed sets.
rules.remediation: Use only allowed radius, elevation, and motion values from the constitution.

rules.description: Fails when radius/elevation/motion variance exceeds limits.
rules.remediation: Tighten component values to keep variance under the allowed maximum.

rules.description: Fails when patterns are used outside allowed intent scopes.
rules.remediation: Align pattern usage with intents permitted by design intent and constitution.
